# optimization.results.convergence.__init__

**Source:** `src\optimization\results\convergence\__init__.py`

## Module Overview

Convergence analysis tools for optimization results.
This module provides analysis tools for studying optimization convergence
including convergence rate analysis, stopping criteria evaluation,
and convergence pattern recognition for algorithm performance assessment.
